description.en: The action is used for publish output message into an MQTT server.
description.zh: 该操作用于将输出消息发布到 MQTT 服务器中

hint.en: The broker address of the MQTT server, such as tcp://127.0.0.1:1883.
hint.zh: MQTT 服务器地址，例如 tcp://127.0.0.1:1883

hint.en: The MQTT topic, such as analysis/result
The client id for MQTT connection. If not specified, an uuid will be used
hint.zh: MQTT 连接的客户端 ID。 如果未指定，将使用一个 uuid

hint.en: MQTT protocol version. 3.1 (also refer as MQTT 3) or 3.1.1 (also refer as MQTT 4).  If not specified, the default value is 3.1.
hint.zh: MQTT 协议版本。3.1 (也被称为 MQTT 3) 或者 3.1.1 (也被称为 MQTT 4)。 如果未指定，缺省值为 3.1。

hint.en: The certification path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path. If it is an relative path, then the base path is where you excuting the kuiperd command. For example, if you run bin/kuiperd from /var/kuiper, then the base path is /var/kuiper; If you run ./kuiperd from /var/kuiper/bin, then the base path is /var/kuiper/bin.
hint.zh: 证书路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。如果指定的是相对路径，那么父目录为执行 kuiperd 命令的路径。比如，如果你在 /var/kuiper 中运行 bin/kuiperd ，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper; 如果运行从 /var/kuiper/bin 中运行./kuiperd，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper/bin

hint.en: The private key path. It can be either absolute path, or relative path, which is similar to use of certificationPath.
hint.zh: 私钥路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径，相对路径的用法与 certificationPath 类似

hint.en: The location of root ca path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path.
hint.zh: 根证书路径，用以验证服务器证书。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。

hint.en: If InsecureSkipVerify is true, TLS accepts any certificate presented by the server and any host name in that certificate.  In this mode, TLS is susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks. The default value is false. The configuration item can only be used with TLS connections.
hint.zh: 如果 InsecureSkipVerify 设置为 true, TLS接受服务器提供的任何证书以及该证书中的任何主机名。 在这种模式下，TLS容易受到中间人攻击。默认值为false。配置项只能用于TLS连接。

description.en: This a demo 0MQ sink plugin, it cannot be used in production env.
description.zh: 本插件为演示 ZMQ 数据发送插件，不能使用在生产环境中

hint.en: The url of the Zero Mq server
hint.zh: Zero Mq 服务器的 URL

description.en: Example python plugin for butterworth filter
description.zh: 示例python插件IRR滤波-巴特沃斯滤波

description.en: Example python plugin for chebyshev filter
description.zh: 示例python插件IRR滤波-使用切比雪夫滤波

functions.name: chebyshev
functions.example: chebyshev(data, fs, ftype, freqs, order, rp)

hint.en: Degree of the polynomial used for smoothing

label.en: Degree of the polynomial used for smoothing

description.zh: 计算傅立叶变换（幅值谱）

hint.zh: 计算傅立叶变换（幅值谱）

description.zh: 计算傅立叶变换（幅值谱）

hint.zh: 计算傅立叶变换（幅值谱）

hint.en: The value is 0-1, float, indicating that the peak and trough are judged by the percentage of the highest value.
hint.zh: 取值为0-1，float，表示以最值的百分比作为判断波峰波谷

description.en: The action is used for publish output message into an MQTT server.
description.zh: 该操作用于将输出消息发布到 MQTT 服务器中

hint.en: The broker address of the MQTT server, such as tcp://127.0.0.1:1883.
hint.zh: MQTT 服务器地址，例如 tcp://127.0.0.1:1883

hint.en: The MQTT topic, such as analysis/result
The client id for MQTT connection. If not specified, an uuid will be used
hint.zh: MQTT 连接的客户端 ID。 如果未指定，将使用一个 uuid

hint.en: MQTT protocol version. 3.1 (also refer as MQTT 3) or 3.1.1 (also refer as MQTT 4).  If not specified, the default value is 3.1.
hint.zh: MQTT 协议版本。3.1 (也被称为 MQTT 3) 或者 3.1.1 (也被称为 MQTT 4)。 如果未指定，缺省值为 3.1。

hint.en: The certification path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path. If it is an relative path, then the base path is where you excuting the kuiperd command. For example, if you run bin/kuiperd from /var/kuiper, then the base path is /var/kuiper; If you run ./kuiperd from /var/kuiper/bin, then the base path is /var/kuiper/bin.
hint.zh: 证书路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。如果指定的是相对路径，那么父目录为执行 kuiperd 命令的路径。比如，如果你在 /var/kuiper 中运行 bin/kuiperd ，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper; 如果运行从 /var/kuiper/bin 中运行./kuiperd，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper/bin

hint.en: The private key path. It can be either absolute path, or relative path, which is similar to use of certificationPath.
hint.zh: 私钥路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径，相对路径的用法与 certificationPath 类似

hint.en: The location of root ca path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path.
hint.zh: 根证书路径，用以验证服务器证书。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。

hint.en: If InsecureSkipVerify is true, TLS accepts any certificate presented by the server and any host name in that certificate.  In this mode, TLS is susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks. The default value is false. The configuration item can only be used with TLS connections.
hint.zh: 如果 InsecureSkipVerify 设置为 true, TLS接受服务器提供的任何证书以及该证书中的任何主机名。 在这种模式下，TLS容易受到中间人攻击。默认值为false。配置项只能用于TLS连接。

description.en: Reading file content into the eKuiper processing pipeline. The file source is usually used as a table and it is the default type for create table statement.
description.zh: 读取文件内容，并且将数据放入 eKuiper 数据处理流水线中。通常用于表格，且为使用 create table 语句时，默认的源类型。

hint.en: The directory of the file relative to eKuiper root or an absolute path. Do not include the file name here. The file name should be defined in the stream data source.
hint.zh: 文件所在文件夹的路径。请勿包含文件名，文件名应该在数据源中定义。

hint.en: The interval between reading the files, time unit is ms. If only read once, set it to 0
hint.zh: 读取文件的间隔时间。如果只需读取一次，设置为0。

description.en: This a sink plugin for TDengine, it can be used for saving the analysis data into TDengine.
description.zh: 本插件为 TDengine 的持久化插件，可以用于将分析数据存入 TDengine 中
